title: ARAM - Change?
body:
Any chance to allow people to mark a champion they don't want to random?
Say every 10 champions you own, you can mark down one that you don't want to play in ARAM. (10 is just a random number... hell make it every 50 champs you can mark down one.)

I was collecting all the champs back when I played SR, now I basically only play ARAM and I really don't want such a massive pool of champions to random from... I could just remake a new account and only unlock a couple that I like but I'd prefer not to as I have unlocked far too much in this game to restart fresh.

replies.body:
It's ALL random.

Not somewhat random.

If it was ALL random then everyone would have to play every champion there is.

Right now you can go an make a new account and only unlock champs you want to random, I'm just asking for the ability to grey out a champion for each 10 I own, fair trade IMO

Yes cause giving a level 10 a random champ they haven't even played before makes sense.

You either make a new account, or put up with not getting what you want cause things are RANDOM.

Nope, it's "somewhat" random, until they make the entire roster up for everyone it's not fair random.

Anyone who has put time/money into the game is at a disadvantage to someone who has just unlocked a few OP champs.

The fact you're taking ARAM seriously is hilarious in itself, but to get to the point you're wrong, if you look up the definition of "random" you will find that it is in fact All Random All Mid, it is completely fair so stop complaining.

Nah, not taking ARAM seriously I am just trying to increase my enjoyment for when I bother to play this game.

I've played since beta so I got bored of the same old SR map over and over, so ditched the game for a while, ARAM came out I enjoyed it so I played it, ditched the game for a while... recently have came back and thought having a way to grey out a couple champs I don't enjoy would be an ok idea, so why not bring it up for discussion...

So you are saying someone that has unlocked EVERY champion in ARAM, is on an equal playing field to someone who has only unlocked champions that are "OP" in ARAM?

I don't really see why everyone has a stick up their butts... you have the option to unlock a champion and play it, why not give the option to lock it again?

It is better off that way. 
You actually get to play those champion you don't normally play, you get better at the game overall.
Yea, I'm just playing for fun not really to "get better" hence why I only ARAM, I already know what playstyle I enjoy, so I'd prefer to have a higher random chance to play it.

Naturally you should be getting better when you play anyway. 
As JasonWazza already pointed out, it is suppose to be all random, sure you might not like a few champions you get, but there's a reroll system for that. 
The reroll system is basically the solution riot give to the problem you are having right now, since you own a lot of champions, you should get a lot of reroll points per game. 
Furthermore, you pretty much already put a solution to your own problem tbh "I could just remake a new account and only unlock a couple that I like but I'd prefer not to."  This would be the most suitable solution to your personal issue.
Lets hope riot see this and do something about it. 
However, there is simply not enough demand for riot to implant this.
Making a new account to cheese the system shouldn't really be encouraged though.

Well stop bloody complaining then. 
A solution is given, yet you are not willing to use it. 
Riot is not going to change the system for one person who is complaining about something that will have minimal impact on the game play itself.

Lol, The idea of being able to black out or flat out choose your ARAM champ roster is not new, plenty people have asked for it... so it's not just "one guy" (some of them take the point out of "random", just like rerolling a new account does)

I was throwing out an idea that required you to have a boatload of champions to be able to get a minor adjustment to your potential roster, which at least for me would still have a massive selection of champions to random. (I have unlocked all but 3)

I doubt I'd even block out more than 4-5 champions and I'm usually out of rerolls because I reroll to fix team roster problems (All AP/AD/Melee etc), I trade and reroll for others who say they have no rerolls left.

If you read the comments here you would realize a lot of people are against this idea. 
Sure. It might work, people would have the choice of using it or not. 
However, as i stressed before, there is simply not enough demand. The time riot spend on doing this would be better off doing something else. 
In the end, it come back to the point of ARAM, which is all random all mid. Sometimes you will get unenjoyable champions, that is how the system was designed. 
The fact you brought up making a new account and only unlock the champions you want is abusing the system in the first place. 
Blacking out champions don't stop this. 
If it is 10 champions one black out, people will still have a massive pool of champion to choose from. 
If you want pure enjoyment, making a new account is your best bet, you can unlock all the great poking champions such as nid, lux etc.  
Losing is a part of the gaming experience, so is playing non-enjoyable champions in ARAM. Sometimes your teammates will go 1/10 and no matter how hard you try you can't carry them. 
I understand that you play the game for enjoyment, but we should't wrap players in cotton wool all the time. If you think playing those "unenjoyable" champions isn't something you want, why even bother play aram? Use team builder, then you get to play who ever you want.
Sometimes you get wacky teams in aram, all melee, all ap but that's the whole point, it is exciting, surprising and fun.
I think it is too hard for me to deliver that point to you ,thus i'm ending my conversation here. 
I sincerely think this can be done and I wish riot can give this post some attention. 
Good luck.

So if I owned 10 champions and mark 1 of them down so I don't play them. That leaves me with:

Nidalee
Lux
Ziggs
Xreath
Ezreal
Katarina
Azir
Sivir
Zyra

Sweet idea dude.

plus the free ones for each week on top of that.

Who is Xreath?

I also don't really get your point.... I can make a new account and only unlock them same champions... so bringing out my idea to black out a single champion per each 10 you own would make no difference to the current possibilities in this game.... just I could never reach such a small champion pool selection, I'd just be able to remove a couple champions I don't enjoy playing.
I'm happy with the rerolls and swapping. There are only a couple of champions I don't want to play in ARAM even though I have almost all of them.

Swapping isn't that good when hardly anyone has all the champs for you to swap with, I am forever seeing walls of grey trade arrows.

I must say I hardly reroll and I basically enjoy playing every champion, but there are just a couple I just don't like playing (aatrox is my most hated... which funny enough I just got in this ARAM i'm about to load into)

One thing I have also noticed, even though I own almost every damn champ, I seem to always get the "free this week" champs a fair lot.

Everyone seems so aggressive towards this idea for some reason... lol

I don't really visit these forums often... nor play LoL often for that matter, so maybe you are all just this aggressive in every post.
